channel.title: The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'H' on Tech Terminologies
channel.description: Recent content in The complete list of tech terms starting with the letter 'H' on Tech Terminologies

item.title: What is a Honeypot?
item.description: A honeypot is a security system that is designed to attract and “trap” malicious cyber activity.

item.title: What is a Home Page?
item.description: A home page is the main or front page of a website.

item.title: What is a Hard Reset?
item.description: A hard reset, also known as a factory reset or master reset, is the process of restoring a device to its original manufacturer settings.
